Key: ...It seems somewhat stable. More importantly,\nShin, you look exhausted.

Of course I do. Things are a little different here
than in the real world.
...I thought this would be a boy's dream come\ntrue. Is that not the case for you, Shin?

No. Well, you see... Just cut me some slack. I'd
like one normal day where nothing happens.
Hm, I see. Then you don't need to leave that\nworld?

No, no. That's not what I mean! If you think
of any solutions...
Guess it wouldn't go so well.
